<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_445</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_445</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Jugando al billar</string>
            <string language="en">Geometry and a game of billiards</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie und ein Spiel von Karambolagen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La géométrie et un jeu des billards</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geometria e um jogo dos billiards</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La geometria e un gioco dei biliardi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωμετρία και ένα παιχνίδι του μπιλιάρδου</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones diferentes problemas geométricos utilizando en todos los casos como elemento motivador común el juego del billar. Los conceptos geométricos que se estudian son los del simétrico de un punto con respecto de una recta, la distancias entre puntos y la incidencia de rectas.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to solve different geometrical problems using cue sports as their motivation. The geometrical concepts studied include the symmetrical point with respect to an axis of symmetry, the distance between points and the incidence of lines.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">billar</string>
            <string language="en">cue sports</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">simétrico</string>
            <string language="en">symmetric</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plana</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">distancia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">punto</string>
            <string language="en">point distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welche 
Gebrauchsimulationen, die unterschiedlichen geometrischen Probleme zu 
lösen, die Stichwort verwenden, als ihr Beweggrund sports. Die 
geometrischen studierten Konzepte schließen den symmetrischen Punkt 
in Bezug auf eine Mittellinie von Symmetrie, der Abstand zwischen 
Punkten und der Ausdehnung der Zeilen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles simulations 
d'utilisations résoudre différents problèmes géométriques 
utilisant le caractère indicateur fôlatre en tant que leur 
motivation. Les concepts géométriques étudiés incluent le 
point symétrique en ce qui concerne un axe de symétrie, la distance 
entre les points et l'incidence des lignes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que simulações dos usos 
resolver os problemas geométricos diferentes que usam a sugestão 
ostenta como seu motivation. Os conceitos geométricos estudados
incluem o ponto simétrico com respeito a uma linha central da 
simetria, a distância entre pontos e a incidência das linhas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali simulazioni di usi 
risolvere i problemi geometrici differenti che usando l'indicazione 
mette in mostra come loro motivazione. I concetti geometrici 
studiati includono il punto simmetrico riguardo ad un asse della 
simmetria, la distanza fra i punti e l'incidenza delle righe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να λύσει τα διαφορετικά γεωμετρικά προβλήματα χρησιμοποιώντας
τον αθλητισμό συνθήματος ως κίνητρό τους. Οι γεωμετρικές 
έννοιες που μελετώνται περιλαμβάνουν το συμμετρικό σημείο όσον 
αφορά έναν άξονα της συμμετρίας, την απόσταση μεταξύ των 
σημείων και την επίπτωση των γραμμών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stichwortsport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">symmetrisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Punktabstand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sports de caractère indicateur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">symétrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">avion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">distance de point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la géométrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">esportes da sugestão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">symmetric</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">plano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">distância do ponto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sport di indicazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">simmetrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">aereo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">distanza del punto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αθλητισμός συνθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συμμετρικός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωμετρία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
